resources.string: By Creating this account,I accept the Terms and Conditions and acknowledge the Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. It is Mastersoft ERP solutions pvt. ltd.\'s policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, www.iitms.co.in, and other sites we own and operate.
We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.
We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorised access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law. Privacy Policy

Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.
Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us.

About Us
We are a team of dedicated developers passionate about solar energy and data. Our goal is to provide simple and reliable solar data solutions to help you harness the power of renewable energy. With our expertise in data collection, analysis, and visualization, we aim to make solar energy accessible and understandable for everyone.

Our Mission As developers, we\'re committed to creating user-friendly solutions that empower individuals and businesses to make informed decisions about solar energy. Through our innovative approach to data collection and analysis, we aim to provide accurate and accessible information that enables users to optimize their solar energy usage. Our focus is on simplicity, reliability, and practicality, ensuring that our solutions are easy to understand and integrate into everyday life.
